page.title: 16Angling Club Irthlingborough
page.content: There is a flourishing angling club in Irthlingborough because there are so many places locally to fish. There is the river Nene, the canal and a lot of disused gravel pits. The club caters for beginners and experienced fishermen who are happy to pass on their expertise. The anglers meet every Saturday and Sunday in the season, starting early in the morning. During any holiday period, they meet any day of the week that they can. The cost of 30p for one session,covers transport but not tackle and bait. The fishermen meet together in the High Street and travel by van to the particular fishing spot chosen for that day.
